Body:
"""
        Inelegant parameterised test created because pytest doesn't appear to allow
        parameterised tests with fixtures.
        """
remote_with_expected_local = [['hello-world.txt', 'hello-worldtxt',
    'dot in filename'], ['', '-', 'no filename'], ['..', '-',
    'escape directory'], ['//', '-', 'sub-directory'], ['hello%20world',
    'hello20world', 'filename with a space']]
for item in remote_with_expected_local:
    remote_filename = item[0]
    expected_end_of_local_filename = item[1]
    description = item[2]
    self.downloaded_file_has_correct_name(remote_filename,
        expected_end_of_local_filename, description)
